publication.jconf: International Conference on Acoustics, Speech, and Signal Processing
publication.keyword: Compact Representation;Frequency Domain;Indexing Terms;Modal Analysis;Near Field;Wave Equation;
publication.abstract: This paper proposes a continuous HRTF representation in both 3D spatial and frequency domains. The method is based on the acous- tic reciprocity principle and a modal expansion of the wave equation solution to represent the HRTF variations with different variables in separate basis functions. The derived spatial basis modes can achieve HRTF near-field and far-field representation in one formulation.
